segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 12
4. Kaḷārakhattiyavagga
38. Cetanāsutta
Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati.
“Yañca, bhikkhave, ceteti yañca pakappeti yañca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, what you intend or plan, and what you have underlying tendencies for become a support for the continuation of consciousness.

segments.pli: Ārammaṇe sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti.
segments.en: When this support exists, consciousness becomes established.

segments.pli: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hoti.
segments.en: When consciousness is established and grows, there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.

segments.pli: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā sati āyatiṃ jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.
segments.en: When there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future, future rebirth, old age, and death come to be, as do sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
segments.en: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.

segments.pli: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
segments.en: If you don’t intend or plan, but still have underlying tendencies, this becomes a support for the continuation of consciousness.

segments.pli: Ārammaṇe sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti.
segments.en: When this support exists, consciousness becomes established.

segments.pli: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hoti.
segments.en: When consciousness is established and grows, there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.

segments.pli: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā sati āyatiṃ jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.
segments.en: When there is rebirth into a new state of existence in the future, future rebirth, old age, and death come to be, as do sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
segments.en: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
segments.en: If you don’t intend or plan or have underlying tendencies, this doesn’t become a support for the continuation of consciousness.

segments.pli: Ārammaṇe asati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
segments.en: With no support, consciousness is not established.

segments.pli: Tadappatiṭṭhite viññāṇe avirūḷhe āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti na hoti.
segments.en: When consciousness is not established and doesn’t grow, there’s no rebirth into a new state of existence in the future.

segments.pli: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā asati āyatiṃ jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti.
segments.en: When there is no rebirth into a new state of existence in the future, future rebirth, old age, and death cease, as do sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.

segments.pli: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti.
segments.en: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.”

segments.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Intentions or choices are the force that propels consciousness from one life to the next.
